value.description: FSL file uplink to Columbus MMU - Ground required to perform FSL file uplink and switch on Columbus MMU. Col-CC uplinks the file on-board according to provided ICN. Ground only activity. S-Band required. --------------------------------------------------------- STRATOS can perform this activity The STRATOS margin to plan the next activity is 10 minutes.

Perform a file transfer from the DMS MMU to the FSL rack - This is a ground-only activity to transfer a file from the Columbus Data Management System (DMS) Mass Memory Unit (MMU) to the Fluid Science Laboratory (FSL) rack. (This activity will normally be preceded by the file uplink from Col-CC to the MMU.) --------------------------------------------------------- STRATOS can support this activity. The STRATOS margin to plan the next activity is 5 minutes.

ASIM daily file uplink and transfer - Perform ASIM daily file uplink to Columbus MMU and switch of file(s) on the MMU. Col-CC uplinks the file on-board according to provided ICN. Additionally, transfer file(s) from the Columbus Data Management System (DMS) Mass Memory Unit (MMU) to ASIM. Ground only activity. S-Band required. This activity combines the uplink (DMS-ASIM FILE-U/L) and transfer (MMU-ASIM-XFER) for the daily ASIM files. --------------------------------------------------------- STRATOS performs this activity The STRATOS margin to plan the next activity is 10 minutes.
CZT Read-Out Chains enabled during the night passes. Move away from the light to have 2 mins between start night and ROC enable. Move ROC disable away 30 secs from day start.
Cosmic event rejection enable activity. If the nights with SAA are longer than 2 minutes, the cosmic event rejection flag has to be enabled. MMIA SRAM, MEM ID 2230, addres 16 -> 8000
Cosmic event rejection disable activity. If the nights with SAA are longer than 2 minutes, the cosmic event rejection flag has to be enabled. MMIA SRAM, MEM ID 2230, addres 16 -> 8000

Verify the correct functioning of the XCMU Control and Monitor lines: The three digital I/O lines are operational. The two analogue I/O lines are operational. Send XCMU 28V pulse command to switch OFF the Feeder#1 relay. Verify the power Feeder#2 is ON and the survival heaters are active.Verify the XCMU provided TM is available and updating.Monitor both DHPU temperatures measured by XCMU and verify they stabilise within the operational temperature range

metadata.constraints:: PDU1 Outlet 3 deactivated or PPSB SDX_1 switch to discharge. PDU2 Outlet 3 activated and PPSB SDX_2 switch to ON
metadata.GCP steps: E_JSP_1217, E_JSP_1402 step 3, E_JSP_1403, GCP 1.1 DHPU activation
metadata.Notes: To be completed before COL-ASIM-02, duration given is only the commanding the monitoring can last for several hours

value.description: Verify the power connection between the ASIM payload and Columbus.Send XCMU 28V pulse command to power ON Feeder#1. This will power ON the payload. Verify the power consumption on PDU1 outlet 3 is increasing.

metadata.Constraints:: PPSB SDX_1 and SDX_2 switches to ON position.PDU1 Outlet 3 and PDU2 Outlet 3 activated
metadata.Initial conditions: ASIM powered OFF
metadata.Final system mode: ASIM powered on, DHPU: ON - operational, MMIA: OFF, MXGS: OFF
metadata.Notes: To be completed before COL-ASIM-03

value.description: To verify the data connections between Columbus and the ASIM payload.Verify the DHPU H&S data is received. Verify the DHPU HK data is received. Send a test command

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: OFF, MXGS: OFF
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: OFF, MXGS: OFF
metadata.Notes: To be started before SYS-DHPU-01

value.description: To verify the ability to perform a graceful shutdown of the payload.

metadata.Constraints:: At the end of this test ASIM will be off. STRATOS support is needed to re-activate ASIM
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU: on – operational, MMIA: OFF, MXGS: OFF
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: OFF, MMIA: OFF, MXGS: OFF
metadata.GCP steps: E_JSP_2104 Step 2, E_JSP_1402, E_JSP_1401, GCP 1.2 DHPU deactivation
metadata.Notes: STRATOS to stop R/T acquisition before sending the graceful shutdown command.

value.summary: Crew laptop RS-422 external payload interface
value.description: Check out the interface between the crew laptop and the RS-422 line to ASIM.

metadata.Constraints:: The necessary adapter and data cables have to be available in-orbit. The Crew Procedure is available on board. Any laptop can be used, as long as a serial terminal program is available (e.g. HyperTerm). Nice to have: DVD available on board with new flashback-2 software (including ASIM)
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU: on – operational, MMIA: OFF, MXGS: OFF
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON - operational, MMIA: OFF, MXGS: OFF
metadata.GCP steps: E_ASIM_1100 ASIM Serial Line Laptop Check
metadata.Notes: The completion of this step is not a prerequisite to proceed to the next phase or module.
metadata.Support: CREW, (STRATOS if needed for SUP (de)activation but can be done by crew)

value.description: Verify and monitor the evolution of the different temperature readings available in the DHPU H&S.

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.Notes: Can be combined with COL-ASIM-03 and SYS-DHPU-02

value.description: Verify the H&S and HK data received from the DHPU and verify if all values are as expected.

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA: OFF
metadata.Notes: Can be combined with COL-ASIM-03 and SYS-DHPU-01

value.description: Perform a reboot by TC and verify the DHPU boots correctly.

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.Notes: Prerequisite for SYS-DHPU-06

value.description: Perform a listing of the DHPU file system and verify the initial directory structure.

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.Notes: To be performed before SYS-DHPU-05

value.description: To verify the correct uplink of a test file from ground to ASIM and to verify the correct downlink of a test file from ASIM to ground.

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.GCP steps: E_GND_1251, E_GND_1252, E_GND_12201, E_GND_1250, GCP 2.1.6 Col MMU to DHPU File Transfer, GCP 2.1.7 DHPU to Col MMU File TransferGCP 2.1.5 List Files
metadata.Notes: The test file size is limited to a few bytes. The content of the file can be arbitrary.

value.description: To verify the DHPU can be commanded in the different functional modes: Configuration Mode, Operational Mode and Patching Mode

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.Notes: To be performed after SYS-DHPU-03

value.description: List and verify the default monitored parameters and the warning and action limits

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.Notes: To be performed after SYS-DHPU-03

value.summary: Downlink and verification of the DHPU TM log file
value.description: To verify the downlink process and content of the TM Log file

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 3.2 DHPU TM Log file downlink
metadata.Notes: This activity can be performed any time after SYS-DHPU-05. The TM Log is cyclic and contains at least 48 hours of the budgeted non-science data. The TM Log is stored in the DHPU file system and is only downlinked for troubleshooting and diagnostics.The TM log file has to be split before downlink, resulting in multiple files of max 7340032 bytes.

value.description: Verify the functioning of the MMIA decontamination heaters. Verify the thermal profile and investigate the time it takes to heat/cool the optical surfaces.

metadata.Constraints: MMIA is off; no PHOT Calibration scheduled within 60 minutes of the end of decontamination operation
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.Notes: This activity can be performed any time after SYS-DHPU-02

value.summary: Upload of a simple command schedule
value.description: Upload a basic command schedule, for example to dump the memory content of both instruments. Verify a command schedule is loaded and correctly executed

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:ON - configuration
metadata.Notes: This activity can be performed any time after SYS-DHPU-02

value.description: Verify the automatic scheduler is behaving as expected and the instruments are correctly commanded

metadata.Constraints: MMIA PHOTs are off during this test; at least one CHU to be activated. Test should run over SAA. Enable MMIA and MXGS Summary HK at a generation period of 1. Enable Ratemeter HK for MXGS at a generation period of 1. Enable Event Report 30000 and 30010. Disable internal and external triggering for both instruments
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS ON - Operational, MMIA: ON - operational (data processing)
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 2.1.3 Sun Management, GCP 2.1.4 SAA Management
metadata.Notes: The SAA and SUN execution is set back to manual mode at the end of the test. The collected CZT Ratemeter data will be analysed to finetune the SAA boundaries.

value.description: To verify the power and data interface between the DHPU and the MMIA

metadata.Constraints: MMIA DPU and SU temperatures within operational range
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS N/A, MMIA: Off
metadata.Notes: First power on of the MMIA. The MXGS can be either OFF or ON. Is a prerequisite for SYS-MMIA-02

value.description: To verify the basic functionality of the DPU

metadata.Constraints: Enable Instrument Summary HK packet at a generation period of 1, Enable Startup HK packet at a generation period of 0, Enable DPU HK packet at a generation period of 10
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS N/A, MMIA: ON - boot
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 1.6 MMIA checkout, GCP 2.2.14 MMIA HK management
metadata.Notes: The CHU and PHOT voltage supplies remain switched off

value.description: Check the thermal profile of the DPU and the optical bench

metadata.Constraints: Enable Instrument Summary HK packet at a generation period of 1, Enable DPU HK packet at a generation period of 10
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS N/A, MMIA: ON - configuration
metadata.Notes: To be started after SYS-MMIA-02, The CHU and PHOT voltage supplies remain switched off

value.description: Verify the day/night monitoring by the Daylight Sensor

metadata.Constraints: Enable Instrument Summary HK packet at a generation period of 1. Enable DPU HK packet at a generation period of 1, Start the activity during eclipse conditions
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS N/A, MMIA: ON - configuration
metadata.Notes: It may be performed in the background, simultaneously with other checks, such as SYS-MMIA-03, SYS-MMIA-05, and SYS-MMIA-07. Prerequisite for SYS-MMIA-06

value.summary: Retrieve configuration tables and modify default Data Collection Buffer sizes
value.description: Dump the content of the configuration tables in SRAM and EEPROM and note down the initial values. Modify the EEPROM to contain the default tables.

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS N/A, MMIA: ON - configuration
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 1.8 MMIA EEPROM Definition and GCP 2.2.11 MMIA Memory Dump
metadata.Notes: To be performed before any change is made to a configuration table. Change the size of the Data Collection Buffer partitions:- Priority 1 Data Buffer: from 500 to 550 Mbyte-  Priority 2 Data Buffer: from 150 to 300 Mbyte-  Priority 3 Data Buffer: from 100 to 125 Mbyte
metadata.Support: IT, TERMA, STRATOS (for the uplink of the configuration table binary files - TBD)

value.description: Test the basic functionality of the three photometers during eclipse period. Verify the photometer data have the expected profile.

metadata.Constraints: Eclipse period; no SAA; Calm conditions (no active thunderstorms, preferably performed over the oceans), Enable the Instrument Summary at a generation period of 1, Enable DPU HK at a generation period of 10, Enable PHOT HK packets at generation period of 10, To be performed after SYS-MMIA-05
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS N/A, MMIA: ON - configuration
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 2.1.3 Sun Management and GCP 2.2.8 MMIA PHOT Calibration
metadata.Notes: Offline calibration and analysis of the PHOTs might take a day, but the results are not needed to proceed with the following commissioning steps. They will serve as a baseline for future calibrations.

value.description: Test the basic functionality of the two CHUs and verify the camera data have the expected profile.

metadata.Constraints: Eclipse period; no SAA, Enable the Instrument Summary at a generation period of 1, Enable DPU HK at a generation period of 10, Enable CHU HK packets at generation period of 10
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS N/A, MMIA: ON - configuration

value.description: To verify the power and data interface between the DHPU and the MXGS

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS Off, MMIA: N/A
metadata.Notes: First power on of the MXGS. First power on the MXGS DPU, then a few seconds later power on the MXGS PSU. The MMIA can be either OFF or ON. Is a prerequisite for SYS-MXGS-02

value.description: To verify the basic functionality of the DPU and PSU

metadata.Constraints: Enable Instrument Summary HK at rate of 1Hz, Enable Startup HK at a generation period of 0, Enable DPU HK packet at generation period of 10, Enable PSU HK packet at generation period of 10
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS ON - boot, MMIA: N/A
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 1.14 MXGS checkout and GCP 2.3.16 MXGS HK management

value.summary: Retrieve configuration tables and modify default Data Collection Buffer sizes
value.description: Dump the content of the configuration tables in SRAM and EEPROM and note down the initial values.

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.Notes: To be performed before any change is made to a configuration table. Change the size of the Data Collection Buffer partitions: Priority 1 Data Buffer: from 500 to 600 Mbyte- Priority 2 Data Buffer: from 150 to 200 Mbyte Priority 3 Data Buffer: from 100 to 175 Mbyte

value.description: Check the health and basic functionality of each CZT DAU: DAU LV and HV can be switched on- PSU DC-DC Converters for this DAU are functional, with nominal voltage and current HK TM readings-  All readout chains in the DAU are functional (counts coming from all readout chains)- CZT DAU Summary and CZT DAU n Full HK values (for this DAU) are nominal (allowing for possible new noisy pixels).

metadata.Constraints: To be started after SYS-MXGS-03.Requires low background conditions (no SAA). Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1.Enable PSU HK packet at a generation period of 10.Enable CZT DAU Summary HK packet at a generation period of 1 .Enable CZT n DAU Full HK TM packet at generation period of 10 ( where n = 1, 2, 3 or 4 for the CZT DAU n being verified ) . Enable Event Report 40270.Verify the MXGS temperatures (available in DHPU H&S) are within operational range.Wait 15 minutes between the CZT DAU LV power on and the transition to operational mode.
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 1.16 MXGS CZT-DAU Health Check and GCP 2.3.8 MXGS Transparent Configuration
metadata.Notes: MXGS in Transparent Configuration

value.description: Check the health and basic functionality of each BGO DAU . DAU LV and HV can be switched on- PSU DC - DC Converters for this DAU are functional, with nominal voltage and current HK TM readings - All PMTs in the DAU are functional (counts coming from all PMTs) BGO DAU Summary and BGO DAU n Full HK values (for this DAU) are nominal.

metadata.Constraints: To be started after SYS-MXGS-03.Cannot run in parallel with SYS-MXGS-04.Requires low background conditions (no SAA)  Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1.Enable PSU HK packet at a generation period of 10. Enable BGO DAU Summary HK packet at a generation period of 1.Enable BGO n DAU Full HK TM packet at generation period of 10 ( where n = 1, 2, 3 or 4 for the BGO DAU n being verified ) .Verify the MXGS temperatures (available in DHPU H&S) are within operational range.Wait 15 minutes between the BGO DAU LV power on and the transition to operational mode.Enable Event Report 40270
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 1.17 MXGS BGO-DAU Health Check and GCP 2.3.8 MXGS Transparent Configuration
metadata.Notes: MXGS in Transparent Configuration

value.description: To characterise the thermal behaviour of MXGS in orbit and to verify that all MXGS subsystems remain within operational temperature limits over a number of orbits.

metadata.Constraints: Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1. Enable DPU HK packet at a generation period of 60.Enable PSU HK packet at a generation period of 60.Enable CZT DAU Summary HK packet at a generation period of 60.Enable BGO DAU Summary HK packet at a generation period of 60
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.Notes: To be started after completion of SYS-MXGS-04 and SYS-MXGS-05.CZT LV+HV and BGO LV are activated.Monitor CZT DAU Ratemeter values

value.description: Disable noisy and hot pixels in XA-ASIC configuration tables; Reduce ASIC global thresholds from pre-launch values (if possible); update DAU HV settings in PSU configuration table (if needed)

metadata.Constraints: To be started after SYS-MXGS-06.BGO HV should be off.Requires low background conditions (no SAA).Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1.Enable CZT DAU Summary HK packet at a generation period of 1.Enable PSU HK packet at a generation period of 60.Enable Event Report 40270.Wait 15 minutes between the DAU power on and the transition to operational mode.
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 1.19 MXGS DAU Commissioning Procedure, GCP 2.3.8 MXGS Transparent configuration, GCP 2.3.10 MXGS configuration update
metadata.Notes: MXGS in Transparent Configuration. Procedure might need 4 – 6 iterations; in between two data collections, a data collection for SYS-MXGS-08 could be performed giving that at least 1-2 iterations of updating ASIC Configuration Tables for CZT DAUs are completed before starting SYS-MXGS-08

value.description: Adjust the DAU HV settings in PSU configuration table; identify possible changes to the trigger thresholds in the DAU Control configuration table.

metadata.Constraints: To be started after SYS-MXGS-07.CZT Readout Chains could be disabled.Requires low background conditions (no SAA).Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1.Enable BGO DAU Summary HK packet at a generation period of 1.Enable PSU HK packet at a generation period of 60.Enable Event Report 40270.Wait 15 minutes between the DAU power on and the transition to operational mode.
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 1.19 MXGS DAU Commissioning Procedure, GCP 2.3.8 MXGS Transparent configuration, GCP 2.3.10 MXGS configuration update, GCP 2.3.15 MXGS CZT DAU Readout Chain management
metadata.Notes: MXGS in Transparent Configuration.Procedure might need 4 – 6 iterations

value.description: ASIM FEEDER 1 ACTIVATION (OPERATIONAL POWER)

metadata.Constraints: PPSB SDX_1 and SDX_2 switches to ON position. PDU1 Outlet 3 and PDU2 Outlet 3 activated. Verify temperatures are within operational range
metadata.Initial conditions: ASIM Powered off

value.description: ASIM FEEDER2 ACTIVATION (HEATER POWER)

metadata.Constraints: PPSB SDX_1 and SDX_2 switches to ON position. PDU1 Outlet 3 and PDU2 Outlet 3 activated. Verify temperatures are within operational range
metadata.Initial conditions: ASIM Powered off

value.description: ASIM FEEDER#1 DEACTIVATION (OPERATIONAL)
ASIM FEEDER#2 DEACTIVATION (HEATER POWER)

value.summary: Generate a cross trigger from MMIA to MXGS
value.description: Verify cross trigger signals can be sent and received by the instruments

metadata.Constraints:: Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1. Enable MMIA Event Report 30160. Enable MXGS Event Report 40050. Perform after MMIA/MXGS subsystem checkout. Verify first the configuration parameters are set to allow cross trigger signals
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS ON - configuration, MMIA: ON - configuration
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: ON – configuration, MXGS: ON – operational (TGF Search or High Background submode)

value.summary: Generate a cross trigger from MXGS to MMIA
value.description: Verify cross trigger signals can be sent and received by the instruments

metadata.Constraints: Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1,Enable MMIA Event Report 40010, Enable MXGS Event Report 30160, Perform after MMIA/MXGS subsystem checkout, Verify first the configuration parameters are set to allow cross trigger signals
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS ON - configuration, MMIA: ON - configuration
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: ON – operational (data processing), MXGS: ON – configuration

value.summary: Triggered data collection during a thunderstorm
value.description: Verify the data collection when the MMIA is in triggered mode. Pay attention to: buffer sizes, data prioritization, completeness of the data set, functioning of the trigger and cropping algorithms

metadata.Constraints: Eclipse conditions; ISS passing over very active thunderstorm region, Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1, Enable Buffer Resource HK packet at a generation period of 10, Enable Event Report 30090, 30070, 30130, 30140
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MMIA System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: N/A, MMIA: ON - operational (data processing)
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: ON – operational (triggered data collection ==> data collection submode), MXGS: N/A
metadata.Notes: SUN management is not active (TBC), All PHOTs and CHUs active, Activity will be repeated for 10 active thunderstorm regions.Use over-dimensioned cropping parameter for the first observation:CHU_CROP_OFFSET_ROW = 10. CHU_CROP_OFFSET_COLUMN = 10, Duration is 10x6 minutes +5 days data processing and downlink)

value.description: Verify the data collection when the MMIA is in timed mode. Pay attention to: buffer sizes, downlink time

metadata.Constraints: Eclipse conditions, Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1, Enable Buffer Resource HK packet at a generation period of 10, Enable Event Report 30100, 30130, 30140
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MMIA System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: N/A, MMIA: ON - operational (data processing)
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON - operational, MMIA: ON – operational (timed data collection) ==> data processing submode, MXGS: N/A
metadata.Notes: To modify the buffer size, the MMIA needs to be rebooted.Perform the test with the “typical” setup for a timed observation.This step is not a prerequisite for any other step of the module.The data downlink could require considerable amount of time; reconfiguration of buffer sizes can only be done when data transmission is completed.Repeat test in and outside SAA.Duration 10 minutes + time for data processing and downlink

value.description: Verify the performance of the cropping algorithm.

metadata.Constraints: Eclipse conditions; active thunderstorm regions, Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 10
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MMIA System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: N/A, MMIA: ON - operational (data processing)
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: ON – operational (triggered data collection), MXGS: N/A
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 2.2.13 MMIA Update of Science Algorithms
metadata.Notes: The PHOTs could be off during this test.Using data of MMIA-01Duration 5 minutes + time for data processing and downlink (data collected during MMIA-01

value.summary: Priority algorithm and trigger threshold check
value.description: Verify the performance of the cropping algorithm.

metadata.Constraints:: Eclipse conditions; active thunderstorm regions. Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 10
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MMIA System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: N/A, MMIA: ON - operational (data processing)
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON - operational, MMIA: ON – operational (triggered data collection), MXGS: N/A
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 2.2.13 MMIA Update of Science Algorithms
metadata.Notes: All PHOTs and CHUs activeDuration 60 minutes + time for data processing and downlink (data collected during MMIA-01

value.description: To adjust the CHU configuration tables so that the science performance of the two cameras is optimized with respect to: energy range, determination and resolution, and sensitivity

metadata.Constraints: Eclipse conditions; No SAA. Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 10. To be performed for the first time before MMIA-01
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MMIA System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: N/A, MMIA: ON - operational (data processing)
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: ON – operational (timed data collection), MXGS: N/A
metadata.Notes: Image compression is deactivated. PHOTs could be off during this test. Duration 2x3s of timed observation + time for data downlink and processing

value.description: To obtain photometer response curves and their variation over time, for calibration purposes

metadata.Constraints: Eclipse conditions; no SAA; Calm conditions (no active thunderstorms, preferably performed over the oceans). Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 10. To be performed for the first time before MMIA-01
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MMIA System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: N/A, MMIA: ON - operational (data processing)
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: ON – operational (timed data collection), MXGS: N/A
metadata.Notes: Repeat every 24h, at the start of ISS night.Can start after completion of the MMIA subsystem checkout.CHUs could be off during this test.For the duration time for data processing and downlink should be taken into account

value.description: To test the nominal observing mode that generates TGF Event observations. From this data detector background count rates can be found and also the false event trigger rate can be estimated.

metadata.Constraints: ISS in low background (no SAA). Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1. Enable Ratemeter HK at a generation period of 1. Enable CZT DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 10. Enable BGO DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 10. Enable event reports 40270, 30000, 30010
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MXGS System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: N/A, MXGS: ON – operational (TGF search mode)
metadata.Notes: Can only start after completion of MXGS checkout. All DAUs are functional and the DAU Control configuration tables have been updated.Duration: 6 hours + 1 day of data processing

value.summary: Extended observations and trigger threshold adjustments
value.description: To optimize the MXGS trigger thresholds tabulated for a range of background levels, once in-orbit background rates and false trigger rates have been determined

metadata.Constraints: ISS initially in low background (no SAA).Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1.Enable Buffer Resources HK at a generation period of 60.Enable Ratemeter HK at a generation period of 1.Enable CZT DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 60.Enable BGO DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 60.Can be combined with SYS-DHPU-11. MMIA tests can be scheduled in parallel
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MXGS System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: N/A, MXGS: ON – operational (TGF search mode)
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 2.3.6 MXGS triggered observation.GCP 2.3.10 MXGS configuration update
metadata.Notes: To be performed after MXGS-01.Enable automatic commanding for MXGS (SAA management).Verify Automatic Threshold Adjustment is enabled.Verify Autonomous Submode Transition is enabled.Duration: 4x24 hours + time for data processing (4x2days)

value.description: To exercise the coincidence trigger mode wherein LED and HED both produced triggers within nominally 20ms to generate an instrument-level TGF Trigger Event.

metadata.Constraints:: ISS initially in low background (no SAA).Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1.Enable Buffer Resources HK at a generation period of 60.Enable Ratemeter HK at a generation period of 1.Enable CZT DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 60.Enable BGO DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 60
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MXGS System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON - operational, MMIA: N/A, MXGS: ON – operational (TGF search mode)
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 2.3.16 MXGS HED-LED coincident TGF search
metadata.Notes: To be performed after MXGS-02. Enable automatic commanding for MXGS (SAA management).Duration: 24 hours + time for data processing (2 days)

value.description: Collect and downlink 600 seconds of science data with the instrument in Auroral Capture Mode.

metadata.Constraints:: ISS in low background (no SAA).Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1.Enable Buffer Resources HK at a generation period of 60.Enable Ratemeter HK at a generation period of 1.Enable CZT DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 60.Enable BGO DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 60
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MXGS System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON - operational, MMIA: N/A, MXGS: ON – operational (auroral capture submode)
metadata.Notes: depending on background it may be necessary to update configuration parameter for Auroral Submode Threshold so that Auroral Capture submode is entered.Duration: 1 hour + time for data processing (12h)

value.description: To calibrate the individual CZT pixels of the LED detector plane and locate noisy pixels to be disabled, using Cd-109 source lines.

metadata.Constraints:: ISS in low background (no SAA).Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1.Enable Buffer Resources HK at a generation period of 60.Enable Ratemeter HK at a generation period of 1.Enable CZT DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 60.Enable BGO DAU Summary HK at a generation period of 60
metadata.Module: Commissioning: MXGS System Level Functional checks
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: ON - configuration, MMIA: N/A
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: N/A, MXGS: ON – operational
metadata.Notes: MXGS in transparent configuration.HED HV off.Read out chains for non-active LED DAUs are disabled.12h of data outside SAA; not necessarily in consecutive orbits.Duration: 4x12hours + time for data processing

value.description: Verify the correct performance of the MMIA and MXGS scheduler, including SUN and SAA management

metadata.Constraints:: Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: ON - Operational, MMIA: ON - Operational
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: ON – operational, MXGS: ON – operational
metadata.Notes: Typical MMIA and MXGS science schedule.Duration: 24 hours + time for data processing and analysis

value.description: Verify the performance of the cross-triggering mechanism

metadata.Constraints:: Initially ISS eclipse and low background; active orbit.Enable Instrument Summary HK at a generation period of 1.Enable MMIA Event Report 30160, 40010.Enable MXGS Event Report 30160, 40050
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON - operational, MXGS: ON - Operational, MMIA: ON - Operational (data collection)
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: ON – operational, MMIA: ON – operational (triggered data collection), MXGS: ON – operational (TGF search submode)
metadata.GCP steps: GCP 2.3.12 MXGS Internal and Cross-Triggering Management.GCP 2.2.14 MMIA Internal and Cross-Triggering Management
metadata.Notes: Automatic zone management is enabled during this tesT. Can be performed in parallel with ASIM-01

value.description: Perform a reboot by TC and verify the DHPU boots correctly.

metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU ON: Operational, MXGS/MMIA:OFF
metadata.Notes: STRATOS support required to stop the R/T acquisition before sending the reboot command and starting R/T acquisition when reboot is finished

value.description: To verify the ability to perform a graceful shutdown of the payload.

metadata.Constraints:: At the end of this test ASIM will be off. STRATOS support is needed to re-activate ASIM
metadata.Initial conditions: DHPU: on – operational, MMIA: OFF, MXGS: OFF
metadata.Final system mode: DHPU: OFF, MMIA: OFF, MXGS: OFF
metadata.GCP steps: E_JSP_2104 Step 2, E_JSP_1402, E_JSP_1401, GCP 1.2 DHPU deactivation
metadata.Notes: STRATOS to stop R/T acquisition before sending the graceful shutdown command.
